Class Sun

java.lang.Object
Sun
public class Sun extends Object
Represents a Sun collectible in the game. Sun can be naturally spawned on the board or produced by certain plants (e.g., Sunflowers). Collecting sun provides currency for the player to plant more plants.
Since:
2025-06-27

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    Sun(int l, int t)
    Constructs a new Sun object that spawns naturally on the game board.
    Sun(int l, int t, Plant p)
    Constructs a new Sun object that is produced by a specific plant.

  • Constructor Details

    • Sun

      public Sun(int l, int t)
      Constructs a new Sun object that spawns naturally on the game board. Prints a message to the console indicating where the sun spawned.
      Parameters:
      l - The lane index (row) where the sun will be placed.
      t - The tile index (column) where the sun will be spawned.

    • Sun

      public Sun(int l, int t, Plant p)
      Constructs a new Sun object that is produced by a specific plant. Prints a message to the console indicating which plant produced the sun and its location.
      Parameters:
      l - The lane index (row) where the sun will spawn.
      t - The tile index (column) where the sun will spawn.
      p - The Plant object that produced this sun.

      Returns the fixed monetary value of a Sun collectible.

      The integer value of sun.
